function.name: atk_text_get_run_attributes
function.description: Creates an #AtkAttributeSet which consists of the attributes explicitly set at the position @offset in the text. @start_offset and @end_offset are set to the start and end of the range around @offset where the attributes are invariant. See the enum AtkTextAttribute for types of text attributes that can be returned. Note that other attributes may also be returned.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.parameter_description: the offset at which to get the attributes

parameter.name: start_offset
parameter.parameter_description: the address to put the start offset of the range

parameter.name: end_offset
parameter.parameter_description: the address to put the end offset of the range

function.return: an #AtkAttributeSet which contains the attributes explicitly set at @offset.

function.name: atk_text_get_default_attributes
function.description: Creates an #AtkAttributeSet which consists of the default values of attributes for the text. See the enum AtkTextAttribute for types of text attributes that can be returned. Note that other attributes may also be returned.
function.return: an #AtkAttributeSet which contains the default values of attributes. at @offset.

function.name: atk_action_get_name
function.description: Returns the name of the specified action of the object.

parameter.name: i
parameter.parameter_description: the action index corresponding to the action to be performed

function.return: a name string, or an empty string if @action does not implement this interface.

function.name: atk_action_get_keybinding
function.description: Returns a keybinding associated with this action, if one exists.

parameter.name: i
parameter.parameter_description: the action index corresponding to the action to be performed

function.return: a string representing the keybinding, or an empty string if there is no keybinding for this action.

function.name: atk_action_get_localized_name
function.description: Returns the localized name of the specified action of the object.

parameter.name: i
parameter.parameter_description: the action index corresponding to the action to be performed

function.return: a name string, or an empty string if @action does not implement this interface.
